name: ASAccountAuthenticationModificationController
desc: An object that performs a request to modify an account’s authentication properties.

items.name: func perform(ASAccountAuthenticationModificationRequest)
items.desc: Performs a request to upgrade the authentication credentials for an account to a strong password, or to use Sign in with Apple.

items.name: class ASAccountAuthenticationModificationReplacePasswordWithSignInWithAppleRequest
items.desc: A request to upgrade from using a password to using Sign in with Apple.

items.name: class ASAccountAuthenticationModificationUpgradePasswordToStrongPasswordRequest
items.desc: A request to automatically upgrade from a weak password to a strong password.

items.name: class ASAccountAuthenticationModificationRequest
items.desc: A request to modify an account’s authentication properties.

items.name: var presentationContextProvider: ASAccountAuthenticationModificationControllerPresentationContextProviding?
items.desc: An object that provides a presentation context for the account modification request’s user interface.

items.name: var delegate: ASAccountAuthenticationModificationControllerDelegate?
items.desc: An object that receives notifications about the request’s status.
